publications.title: Development of Sustainable Construction Materials Using Recycled Aggregates
publications.authors: Seungil Baek, Kim, J.H., Park, S.W.
publications.abstract: This study investigates the development of sustainable construction materials using recycled aggregates, focusing on mechanical properties and durability aspects.

publications.title: Remote Sensing Applications for Infrastructure Monitoring
publications.authors: Seungil Baek, Lee, S.Y., Choi, H.J.
publications.abstract: This paper presents remote sensing applications for infrastructure monitoring, including bridge and road condition assessment using satellite imagery.
publications.funding: Korea Institute of Civil Engineering and Building Technology

publications.title: Structural Health Monitoring of Concrete Bridges Using Wireless Sensors
publications.authors: Seungil Baek, Park, J.W., Kim, D.H.
publications.journal: Journal of the Korean Society of Civil Engineers
publications.abstract: This study presents a wireless sensor network for structural health monitoring of concrete bridges, focusing on real-time data collection and analysis.
publications.funding: Ministry of Land, Infrastructure and Transport

publications.title: Smart Concrete Technology for Sustainable Construction
publications.authors: Seungil Baek, Lee, M.S., Kang, S.H., Yoo, D.Y.
publications.journal: Proceedings of the International Conference on Smart Materials and Sustainable Technology
publications.abstract: This conference paper presents smart concrete technology incorporating self-healing and self-sensing capabilities for sustainable construction practices.
publications.funding: Korea Research Institute of Standards and Science

publications.title: Non-Destructive Evaluation of Concrete Structures Using Ultrasonic Testing
publications.authors: Seungil Baek, Kim, H.G., Song, Y.C.
publications.abstract: This study presents comprehensive non-destructive evaluation methods for concrete structures using ultrasonic testing techniques.

publications.title: Machine Learning-Based Prediction of Concrete Compressive Strength
publications.authors: Seungil Baek, Park, S.J., Lee, J.H., Kim, W.J.
publications.abstract: This paper presents machine learning algorithms for predicting concrete compressive strength based on mix design parameters and curing conditions.

publications.title: Durability Assessment of High-Performance Concrete in Marine Environments
publications.authors: Seungil Baek, Choi, Y.S., Yang, E.I.
publications.abstract: This study evaluates the durability performance of high-performance concrete in marine environments, focusing on chloride penetration and corrosion resistance.
publications.funding: Korea Institute of Ocean Science and Technology

publications.title: Geopolymer Concrete: Properties and Applications in Construction
publications.authors: Seungil Baek, Lee, H.S., Choe, G.C.
publications.journal: Journal of Materials in Civil Engineering
publications.abstract: This paper reviews the properties and applications of geopolymer concrete as an alternative to traditional Portland cement concrete.
